name: Learning Linkups Private Limited
description: With a rich pool of SMEs, we have developed some unique offerings for our customers. Our solutions include Customized Learning Solutions, Video Learning Solutions, OD Consulting Services, Tech Solutions for Mobile learning, Assessment tools and Training evaluation tools.
Headline: Unlock value of your Human Equity
ShortDescription: We strive to drive productivity in enterprises through our comprehensive suite of product & services .

Highlights.name: Corporate Learning Solutions
Highlights.description: Employee & workplace productivity is akin breathing. It’s vital in keeping your company alive and thriving. In good times, we don’t think too much about it, but when things get labored, or there’s a major blockage, operations quickly grind to a halt. Thus, on the job, training for employees, becomes crucial part of ensuring productivity.

Highlights.name: NextOrbit Learning App
Highlights.description: Digital wave will take you to new shores, surf the waves of digital disruption to success. We are bringing to you cloud based Learning Management System, tailored to your business. Let's onboard and unlock the “Blue Ocean” of Possibilities. Learning Linkups have always pioneered in creating unique solutions for your business needs. We bring to you a technology platform that will help you to quickly launch your own LMS website and app with all the features you need.

Highlights.name: Diagnostic & Development Consulting
Highlights.description: We offer a complete suite of consulting services . With the talent landscape available onboard we offer consulting services for Assessment & Development Centers, Competency Framework-Design, Alignment, Audit, Diagnostic Studies and Change Management

enhanced_description: Learning Linkups Private Limited offers a comprehensive suite of products and services focused on driving enterprise productivity through learning and development. With a rich pool of subject matter experts (SMEs), they provide unique offerings including customized learning solutions, video learning solutions, and organizational development (OD) consulting services. Their technology solutions support mobile learning and include a cloud-based Learning Management System (LMS) called 'NextOrbit Learning App', which allows businesses to quickly launch their own LMS website and app. They also offer assessment tools and training evaluation tools. Additionally, Learning Linkups provides a complete suite of Diagnostic & Development Consulting services, encompassing Assessment & Development Centers, Competency Framework design, alignment, audit, diagnostic studies, and change management. Their solutions aim to unlock the value of human equity and optimize learning within organizations.
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive suite of products and services
Integrated technology and consulting services (OD consulting with tech solutions)
Cloud-based LMS with dedicated app (NextOrbit Learning App) for rapid deployment
Focus on driving enterprise productivity and human equity
implementation_scenarios: Rapid launch of LMS website and mobile app
roi_benefits: Facilitates digital transformation and success (surfing waves of digital disruption)
Unlocks new possibilities ('Blue Ocean' of Possibilities)
scalability_features: Supports organizations of all sizes including small, large, and global enterprises
